title: Maid-san to Boin Damashii
synopsis: The head maid of a rich household wants to retire and choose someone else to replace her. Before she goes however, she decides to give her young master a farewell gift in the form of a hot sex session, followed by interviewing new potential maid recruits with another sex session. Can't complain.
characters: ['Honey, Pumpkin', 'Aida, Aoi', 'Rin, Shaomei', 'Akanesora, Hoozuki', 'Momozono, Momo', 'Shirohime, Noeru']
staff: [['Toshihide, Sano', ['Original Character Design']], ['Saika, Tasuku', ['Original Creator']], ['Good Job?', ['Original Creator']]]
